keys.title: Your keys, your Ergo.
keys.content: By offline generating and printing out your paper wallet, you drastically minimize your exposure to hackers or computer viruses. So just transfer your funds into your new wallet, keep it in a safe place and away from humidity and enjoy the peace of mind of knowing your funds are safe.

offline.title: Go offline.
offline.content: For improved security, the whole process can be done offline. Just download the {downloadUrl} file on GitHub, go offline and open it using your browser as a regular .html file!

verify.content: This tool was built using trusted and well tested libraries by the community, no data is transmitted in any direction and all the process is executed locally at your browser. But don't trust, go to our GitHub repo and verify.

addresses.tip: You can send your funds to any of the above addresses.

mnemonic.title: Mnemonic
mnemonic.tip: DO NOT REVEAL or SHARE THIS MNEMONIC PHRASE with anyone. These words provide complete access to funds stored on this wallet.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.obfuscatingMsg: Please, ignore this. Just some noise to help obfuscate the mnemonic, just in case someone tries to see through the wallet by using a flashlight.
instructions.bulletOne: Fold this sheet in four parts using the dashed line as a guide, so that the mnemonic phrase stays on the inside part and, then, seal it with tape or glue; and
instructions.bulleTwo: Keep it safe and away from humidity. Treat a paper wallet like cash. If you lose it or it becomes illegible, your funds are gone forever.
